paragraphs.text: As all the fruits of the season come to us in their proper time, flowers in spring, corn in summer, and apples[fn-28-P2811_940426:2-nf] in autumn, so the fruit for winter is talk.

references.text: mh=lon. But, like the Latin malum, this word served for more than we mean by "apple." So the malum Cydonium was quince, the malum Persicum, peach, etc.
